Kenneth Stanley wrote:

>Very cool visualization interface!  I noticed a few minor things 
>though:
>
>-I don't think the default value for connectness of the initial 
>genome should be 0.2.  The default should be 1 and people should be 
>able to adjust it down from there.  I think most users would not 
>know what the 0.2 is and not understand what affect it's having.
>
>-I find I can't delete a network in the species visualization as it 
>says I can.  The only species that I can get to disappear are dead 
>ones, and not by clicking on them.
>
>-Something went wrong with file loading in the pole balacing and 
>prey capture simulators.  It seems you changed something about your 
>file structure but didn't make the corresponding change in their 
>loaders.
>
>It's getting quite impressive.  Congratulations on really nice work!
>  
>

Hi Ken,

Thanks for the feedback and words of encouragement :)

I'll get right onto the problems/suggestions.

Colin.
